data.title: Capacity Assessment Tool - Village Development Committee
data.meta_description:
Capacity Assessment Tool - Village Development Committee - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a capacity assessment tool to evaluate Village Development Committees (VDCs) in Nepal. It was developed by CARE International in Nepal. 

The tool consists of 4 components to assess a VDC's capacity: 1) program planning, implementation, monitoring and coordination; 2) organizational structure and management; 3) resource mobilization; and 4) public service. Each component contains several indicators that describe an ideal situation. 

The assessment involves both group and individual interviews. Group interviews are used to assess components 1, 3 and 4, involving 6-7 participants from different levels and positions within the VDC. Individual interviews assess the more sensitive component 2 on organizational structure, interviewing at least 5 people including the
